title: DepNeCTI: Dependency-based Nested Compound Type Identification for Sanskrit. (arXiv:2310.09501v1 [cs.CL])
abstract: Multi-component compounding is a prevalent phenomenon in Sanskrit, and understanding the implicit structure of a compound's components is crucial for deciphering its meaning. Earlier approaches in Sanskrit have focused on binary compounds and neglected the multi-component compound setting. This work introduces the novel task of nested compound type identification (NeCTI), which aims to identify nested spans of a multi-component compound and decode the implicit semantic relations between them. To the best of our knowledge, this is the first attempt in the field of lexical semantics to propose this task.  We present 2 newly annotated datasets including an out-of-domain dataset for this task. We also benchmark these datasets by exploring the efficacy of the standard problem formulations such as nested named entity recognition, constituency parsing and seq2seq, etc. We present a novel framework named DepNeCTI: Dependency-based Nested Compound Type Identifier that surpasses the performance

translated_title: DepNeCTI: 依赖性基于嵌套复合类型识别的梵语研究
translated_abstract: 多组分的复合是梵语中普遍存在的现象，理解复合语的组分的隐含结构对于解读其含义至关重要。之前的梵语研究主要关注二元复合，忽视了多组分复合的情况。本文介绍了嵌套复合类型识别（NeCTI）这一新颖任务，旨在识别多组分复合的嵌套片段，并解码它们之间的隐含语义关系。据我们所知，这是词汇语义领域中首次提出这一任务。我们提出了包括域外数据集在内的两个新注释数据集来进行这项任务的基准测试。我们还通过探索嵌套命名实体识别、组成分析和序列到序列等标准问题的有效性，进行了这些数据集的基准测试。我们提出了一种名为DepNeCTI的新型框架：基于依赖关系的嵌套复合类型识别器，其性能超越了现有方法。
tldr: 本文提出了一种依赖性基于嵌套复合类型识别（DepNeCTI）的新型框架，旨在解决梵语中多组分复合的隐含结构识别问题。通过提出新的任务和数据集，并探索了多种问题形式的有效性，该框架实现了优越的性能。
en_tdlr: This paper introduces a novel framework called DepNeCTI for dependency-based nested compound type identification in Sanskrit, which aims to decode the implicit semantic relations between nested spans of multi-component compounds. It surpasses the performance of existing methods by proposing a new task, annotated datasets, and exploring the efficacy of various problem formulations.
